description: Shredded roast chicken and creamy coleslaw combined in a mixed grain wrap, what's not to love? This simple recipe is bursting with flavour.
name: Easy Chilli Chicken Coleslaw Wraps Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 cup Praise Goodness whole egg chilli mayonnaise
2 cups Woolworths RSPCA-approved roast chicken, shredded
0.25 bunch continental parsley, leaves picked (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place wraps on a clean work surface. Spread each with 1 tbs of mayonnaise.
Leaving a 2cm border, top each wrap with coleslaw.
Arrange chicken over coleslaw. Fold in sides of each wrap. Roll wrap up tightly to enclose filling.
Cut each wrap in half. Serve sprinkled with parsley and remaining mayonnaise.
